info.name: Last.fm - Sleek Dark Blue
info.description: *NEW* Sleek Dark Blue now in version 4.0 (March 2014).
info.additionalInfo:
CHANGELOG

03/25/14: 4.0.0 – new version.
09/19/13: 3.1.3 – some little display error fixes.
09/17/13: 3.1.2 – major fixes to new header and footer layout.
07/17/13: 3.0.2 – some color fixes.
07/15/13: 3.0.1 – few color fixes for Labs.
07/13/13: 3.0.0 – new version.
06/07/12: 2.9.5 – Firefox form radius fix.
04/22/12: 2.9.4 – fixed background images.
04/10/12: 2.9.3 – new search box.
04/10/12: 2.8.3 – subscribers icon optimized.
04/02/12: 2.8.2 – some fixes.
03/30/12: 2.8.1 – minor changes.
03/29/12: 2.8.0 – some bug fixes.
03/29/12: 2.7.9 – brand new formular fields.
03/28/12: 2.6.9 – optimized canceled event warning.
03/07/12: 2.6.8 – removed linear gradient.
03/07/12: 2.6.7 – minor changes (form shadow and last.fm blog page adjustments).
03/03/12: 2.6.6 – a lot of borders adjusted.
03/02/12: 2.5.6 – adjusted wiki and concert page, currently tracklist colored light blue.
03/01/12: 2.4.6 – little bug fix.
03/01/12: 2.4.5 – some bug and color fixes, adjusted starter pages (not perfect!).
03/01/12: 2.3.5 – minor changes.
02/29/12: 2.3.4 – Valentine page adjusted and fixed bugs, hype counter bolded.
02/29/12: 2.2.4 – minor changes.
02/28/12: 2.2.3 – optimized span bar and source.
02/28/12: 2.2.2 – minor changes and bug-fixes.
02/28/12: 2.2.1 – horizontaly week-charts and h2 wrappers optimized, dates in events changed from red to blue.
02/27/12: 2.1.1 – forum and some colors optimized, many bug-fixes.
02/27/12: 2.0.1 – font-sizes, -colors and new divs adjusted.
02/27/12: 2.0.0 – new version: new form-effects, revised colors, adjusting for all pages, a few fixed borders, background colors adjusted, optimized design.
02/25/12: 1.7.0 – new text-shadows and color fixes.
11/21/11: 1.5.7 – some color changes.
11/21/11: 1.5.6 – new tasteometer span colors, div adjustments and rare color problem fixes.
11/19/11: 1.4.6 – some color fixes.
11/15/11: 1.4.5 – forum page colors customized.
11/15/11: 1.4.4 – some bug fixes on all pages – if you find some color problems contact me, please.
11/14/11: 1.3.4 – many color changes; some bug fixes.
11/13/11: 1.3.3 – some background-color changes in dropdown menus; color change for dimgray.
11/13/11: 1.3.2 – made background-color for a:hover transparent (bug fix for API page).
11/12/11: 1.3.1 – logo on Last.fm-system status customized; shadow added for h1, code more user friendly.
11/11/11: 1.3.0 – Last.fm-system status page customized.
11/10/11: 1.2.9 – other errors fixed.
11/09/11: 1.2.8 – bug fix (a.ontour links).
11/09/11: 1.2.7 – color and optical adjustments on all subpages of Last.fm. It took hours! :-)
11/08/11: 1.1.7 – a lot of font and link colour changes; bug fixes on many pages.
11/08/11: 1.0.7 – some link styling changes.
11/08/11: 1.0.6 – rounded much more divs and spans.
11/08/11: 1.0.5 – div-bug fix.
11/08/11: 1.0.4 – rounded all the other corners for Chrome.
11/07/11: 1.0.3 – rounded corners for Chrome.
11/07/11: 1.0.2 – text-shadow in chartbar cell removed.
11/06/11: 1.0.1 – code descriptions changed into English.
11/06/11: 1.0.0 – code descriptions are in German. This will change with the next update.

data.title: The best last.fm blue colored theme ever!!!
Simple and easy on the eyes..
